description: This Kotlin source file defines a Fragment named HomeFragment for an Android application. It manages the home screen UI that displays a list of recipes, supports pull-to-refresh, and handles user interactions such as toggling favorites and opening recipe details.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: A Fragment representing the home screen that displays recipes with pull-to-refresh, handles favorites, and navigation to recipe details.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment and favorites store.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Sets up the UI components, RecyclerView, swipe refresh, and loads data initially and on refresh.

methods.name: refreshFavs
methods.description: Suspending function to refresh the set of favorite recipe IDs from the FavoritesStore.

methods.name: refreshFavsAndList
methods.description: Suspending function to refresh favorites and update the recipe list.

methods.name: openDetail
methods.description: Navigates to the recipe detail view for the selected recipe.
